dl.dd:
To see the collection of prior posting to the list, visit the feuerkraft-devel archives.
To post a message to all the list members, send email to feuerkraft-devel@nongnu.org
(Un)Subscribe by following instructions on the list information page.

To see the collection of prior posting to the list, visit the feuerkraft-cvs archives.
To post a message to all the list members, send email to feuerkraft-cvs@nongnu.org
(Un)Subscribe by following instructions on the list information page.

section.title: IRC
section.p: There is no special channel for Feuerkraft, but you can find me quite often on IRC at #gametome:
